sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"低语"之意。
means: murmur ： 通常指人、微风或小溪等的低沉、柔和或连续的声音。
mutter ： 多指别人不易听到的低语。
whisper ： 通常指耳语、窃窃私语。

word_mean: 耳语：经由声门呼吸道呼吸产生的一种柔和的低咝咝不发声的语音

sentence.Network_en: I've heard a whisper that the Bishop intends to leave.
sentence.Network_cn: 我听到有谣传说主教打算离开.

sentence.Network_en: "So what do you think?" she said in a hoarse whisper.
sentence.Network_cn: “那么你认为如何？”她声音嘶哑地悄声问道。

sentence.Network_en: Her voice will drop to a dismissive whisper.
sentence.Network_cn: 她会把声音压低，轻蔑地低语。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hwisprian, of Germanic origin; related to German wispeln, from the imitative base of whistle

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 歌曲名称：Whisper 专辑名称：蜜雪薇琪 歌手姓名：蜜雪薇琪 发行时间：2004-7-9 发行公司：BMG 专辑语种：国语 歌手：伊凡塞斯Evanescence-Whisper 专辑：Fallen 歌手：Evanescence 语言：英语 流派：Rock 发行时间：2003-03-01 唱片公司：Wind-Up Perfect by nature, icons of self-indulgence Just what we all need More lies about a world That never was and never will be Have you no shame, don''t you see me?

entry.def: When you whisper, you say something very quietly, using your breath rather than your throat, so that only one person can hear you.

example.ex: She sat on Rossi's knee as he whispered in her ear...
example.tran: 她坐在罗西的膝盖上，听他低声耳语。

entry.def: If people whisper about a piece of information, they talk about it, although it might not be true or accurate, or might be a secret.

example.ex: Today, we no longer gasp when we hear a teenage girl is pregnant or whisper about unmarried couples who live together...
example.tran: 今天，我们听到未成年少女怀孕时不会再感到惊讶，也不会再去私下谈论谁谁未婚同居。

example.ex: It is whispered that he intended to resign...

entry.tran: 发出低沉而轻微的声音；沙沙（或飒飒）作响
entry.def: If something whispers, it makes a low quiet sound which can only just be heard.

example.ex: The cold breeze moved through the bushes around him, whispering just loud enough to obscure the chanting...
example.tran: 冷飕飕的风吹动着他周边的矮树丛，沙沙声刚好盖过了吟唱的声音。

example.ex: The car's tires whispered through the puddles.
example.tran: 穿过水坑时汽车的轮胎发出呜呜声。

means.word_mean: 1. speaking softly without vibration of the vocal cords
2. the light noise like the noise of silk clothing or leaves blowing in the wind
1. speak softly; in a low voice

auth_sentence.content: His Sibylline whisper would change to a louder note.
auth_sentence.res_content: His Sibylline whisper would change to a louder note.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His Sibylline whisper would change to a louder note.

auth_sentence.content: I stroke his short curls, whisper into his ear.
auth_sentence.res_content: I stroke his short curls, whisper into his ear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I stroke his short curls, whisper into his ear.

auth_sentence.content: You can whisper also, Remember, remember.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can whisper also, Remember, remember.

means.word_mean: 低声说, 耳语, 嘀咕,低语；私语；小声说

sentences.en: Did she whisper in your ear at the meeting?
sentences.cn: 开会时, 她跟你私下交谈了吗?

sentences.en: He whispered that he had got a new job.
sentences.cn: 他低声说他已找到了新工作。

sentences.en: He whispered the news to me.
sentences.cn: 他私下告诉我这个消息。

sentences.en: I whispered him not to make any noise.
She whispered to me that his temperature was up again.
sentences.cn: 她低声对我说他的体温又上升了。

means.word_mean: 叶子、风等 沙沙作响；发飒飒声

sentences.en: The wind was whispering in the pines.

means.word_mean: 轻柔的飒飒(风)声; 低语, 耳语, 私语

sentences.en: This fine engine makes only a whisper when running at full speed.
sentences.cn: 这部优良的发动机全速开动时也只发出一点点沙沙声。

sentences.en: I've heard a whisper that he's going to resign.
sentences.cn: 我听到了一个传闻说他准备辞职。

jushi.english: The wind was whispering in the pines.
Did she whisper in your ear at the meeting?
jushi.chinese: 开会时,她跟你私下交谈了吗?

jushi.english: You'll have to whisper or he'll hear.
jushi.chinese: 你得小点儿声说,否则他会听到的。
